segments.text: This kitchen drawing captures a moment of everyday life gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is busy with the dishes, towel in hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink overflow is ridiculousâ€”water everywhere!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's dripping down the cabinet doors and pooling on the tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her shoe's wet, yet she polishes away without a glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above shows a lovely garden path with bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the boy's on a stool that's clearly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies, plate balanced precariously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl stands below, arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's adorable how they're sharing this secret snack time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But really, that stool could tip and hurt him badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom's apron and dress make her look so proper amid the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside just highlights how tense things are in here.
segments.speaker: PAR
